text:
Sec
13(b)(5) provides that the OT provisions of the FLSA shall not apply to any
individual employed as an outside buyer of poultry, eggs, cream, or milk in
their raw or natural state.
html: Sec 13(b)(5) provides that the OT provisions of the FLSA shall not apply to any individual employed as an outside buyer of poultry, eggs, cream, or milk in their raw or natural state.
